column5: ....If you're not checking out the OFC News section you're missing some good reading such as....   Salmon farms destroying wild salmon populations in Canada: study  Trout Unlimited opposes plans to stock brown trout  High Winds Tilt Lake Erie's Surface 4.7 metres  and....  Students spread message on protecting Lake Simcoe; Georgian College group talks with ice fishermen
That wind tide is a "Booger-Bear" aint it?  It would be nice if we could reply to those stories in that section and I think it would draw more interest as well...  ... or not.
...Well that's easily done if there's enough interest. Is there enough interest?
Open it up and lets see!
Yes Chris... I tried to respond to one the other day and was going to copy/paste and start a duplicate thread.
....Okay unless I fried the entire board you should be able to reply to threads.
Chris...I've tried to comment on them too...great idea...we can at least try it for a bit.  Thanks.
